title: Stock Futures Tick Lower After Last Weekâ€™s Rally
sub_head: Oil prices remain elevated at more than $100 a barrel, continue to advance
body:
U.S. stock futures edged lower and oil prices rose after major indexes notched their strongest week since November 2020.
Futures for the S&P 500 slipped 0.1% Monday. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 declined 0.3% and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average receded 0.3%.
